content: 5 slip_stitch in next st cut the yarn and leave a long tail to sew it to the head do not stuff 5 cheek make 2 with yarn in pink color round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 skip next single_crochet and make a slip_stitch in next st cut the yarn and leave a long tail to sew it to the head leg make 4 with yarn in main color round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 round 2 1 single_crochet increase x 3 9 round 3-4 9 single_crochet 2 rounds 9 slip_stitch in next st cut the yarn and leave a long tail to sew it to the body stuff with filling 6 big spot make 2 with yarn in additional color round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 1 single_crochet increase x 6 18 skip next single_crochet and make a slip_stitch in next st cut the yarn and leave a long tail to sew it to the body small spot make 2 with yarn in additional color round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 round 2 increase x 6 12 skip next single_crochet and make a slip_stitch in next st cut the yarn and leave a long tail to sew it to the body 7 assembly sew the big horn on the head s nose tip sew the smaller horn on each side of the head between round 3 and 4 sew the cheeks on each side of the head between round 6 and 7 embroider the eyes on each side of the head with black yarn how the eye should look like it s up to you - press the front of the body into the middle of the head s backside where you have filled lightly with filling and sew it together around the whole neck by flipping the neckshield you can easier sew it to the body see picture to the right sew the legs on the bottom of the body where to place them it s up to you if you like them close to each other or further away the legs on my green dino is attached between round 19-22 and round 26-29 sew one big spot and one small spot on one side of the body and the other two on the other side of the body where to place them it s up to you the spots on my green dino is attached between round 17-21 and round 23-28 8 congratulation your cera triceratops is done thank you for making her i hope that you enjoyed crocheting her as much as i loved designing her gorgeous work please do share your don t forget to tag me on instagram @handmade_by_halime
